Our organization includes secular as well as observant students, and all of our events are open to the entire law school community. Activities include social events, speakers on Jewish or legal topics, and events celebrating Jewish holidays. We are also affiliated with the University's Bronfman Center for Jewish Life and the Jewish Graduate Students Association.   Please check out the Resources link to see the "Jewish Law Students Association (JLSA): Guide to Jewish life in NYC" for listings of NYC restaurants, services, groceries and more!   If you have any questions or would like to get involved with events, please feel free to contact any member of the board under the Contact Us link.
